content:
Hi, there, I am Jiaxin Liu. Currently I am an undergraduate student in Kuang Yaming Honors School at Nanjing University, majoring in computer science and technology. Also, I am an incoming Ph.D. student in School of Software at Tsinghua University.
My research interests lie mainly in formal verification and program analysis. If you are interested, please feel free to drop me an email.
About me
Chinese Name: 刘嘉欣 English Name: Zach Hobbies: Running, Hiking, Piano, Oil Painting
